name: HumanLayer
long_description:
HumanLayer is an API and SDK that enables tool-calling AI Agents to contact humans for help, feedback, and approvals.

For example, one of our customers uses HumanLayer to have his SDR agent ping him in slack to review/revise agent-drafted emails before they go out to prospects.

HumanLayer has clients for Python and Typescript, is designed to work with any framework + LLM, and lets you contact humans across slack, sms, email, and other channels.
